isis.stitle: 7.3 Liter Diesel Engine Service (1991) - INJECTION PUMP, NOZZLES, FUEL FILTER, SUPPLY PUMP AND GLOW PLUGS - FUEL FILTER/WATER SEPARATOR ASSEMBLY REMOVAL AND REASSEMBLY (U-Haul Application Only) - DISASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: DISASSEMBLY
svcproc.para:
Reference Nos. are located on Figure 9.25
.

step1.para: Disconnect all lines, hoses and electrical connections. Remove the filter assembly from the engine.
Remove the drain bowl (13) from the fuel filter element (9).
Remove drain bowl O-Ring (10) and discard.
Unscrew filter element (9) from threaded insert (8). Discard element (9).
Remove drain valve cap nut (11) to disengage the drain valve (15). Remove drain valve seal (12) and discard. Remove the drain valve assembly and clean as necessary.
Do not remove the vent valve assembly (14). If damaged, replace the entire drain bowl assembly.
Unscrew water sensor probe (16) and discard O-Ring (17).
Remove the threaded insert (8) which secures the fuel heater (7) to the header (2) using a box end or socket wrench. Clean threads on insert and at header to remove old thread sealant.
Remove fuel heater (7) and O-Ring (6) from header. Discard the O-Ring (6).
Using a small wrench, remove the following from the header (2):

step2.para: Vacuum switch (1) (fuel filter element replacement indicator).
Continuous vent and check valve assembly (4).

note.para: Clean threads to remove old thread sealant.
